gui.description: A set of sleek, modern pink buttons perfect for visual novels with a cute aesthetic.

gui.name: Pastel Textbox Collection

gui.description: A collection of soft, pastel-colored text boxes with decorative edges.

gui.name: Dark Mode Interface Kit

gui.description: Complete dark mode interface kit with low-light optimization for comfortable gameplay.

gui.name: Glitch Effect Elements

gui.description: Glitchy UI elements perfect for fourth-wall breaking or horror-themed mods.

gui.name: Rounded Button Pack
gui.author: SmoothUI
gui.description: Soft, rounded buttons with gentle hover effects and multiple color variations.

gui.name: Classroom-themed Menu System
gui.author: SchoolLifeDesigns
gui.description: Menu design that resembles school notebooks and chalkboards, perfect for school-life games.

gui.name: Transparent Text Box Set

gui.name: Neon Frame Collection
gui.author: NightCityUI
gui.description: Vibrant neon-styled frames and borders for a cyberpunk aesthetic.

gui.name: Custom Cursor Pack
gui.author: PointerWorks
gui.description: Set of themed cursors to replace the default pointer in your visual novel.

gui.name: Minimalist Button Collection
gui.author: SimplistDesign
gui.description: Ultra-clean, minimalist button designs that won't distract from your story.

gui.name: Seasonal Menu Templates
gui.author: FourSeasons
gui.description: Menu templates for spring, summer, fall, and winter themes, easy to customize.

gui.name: Handwritten Style Text Boxes
gui.author: ScriptFonts
gui.description: Text boxes that look like handwritten notes, journals, or letters.

gui.name: Fantasy UI Framework

gui.name: Loading Animations Pack
